attributes.background:
As one of the worlds most important men, with huge influence on important areas of policy, having also influenced so many others over a quite incredible lifetime it is staggering that Sir David Attenborough is not a Lord.
Continued politicisation of he House of Lords makes this is even more vital.

rejection.details:
In any case, non-party-political life peers are nominated by the House of Lords Appointments Commission, which is independent.

You can find out how members of the public can nominate people as life peers here:

http://lordsappointments.independent.gov.uk/frequently_asked_questions.aspx
